name: Anda (HappyAviala)
description:
Explore a dreamy world in this 3rd-person Collect-A-Thon game where you collect the souls of passed away friends and try to find out what happened to them.

______________________________________________________________

This game was made during a 3 week course in game development
Animator and Character/3D Artist:  Mathilda @Awaa_Art
Level Designer and Programmer: Happy @HappyAviala

Game works best in 1920x1080 resolution.

We do not own rights to any sounds or music used in the game.
